Simple Note Chrome Extension

Description
This Chrome extension provides a secure and convenient way to take and manage encrypted notes directly in your browser. With a clean, user-friendly interface, it allows you to create multiple tabs of notes, each encrypted and stored locally for privacy.

Features
Multi-Tab Support: Create and manage multiple tabs of notes.

Automatic Resizing: The input window automatically resizes based on the amount of text entered.

Local Encryption: All notes are encrypted before being saved locally, ensuring your data remains private.

Persistent Storage: Your notes remain available even after restarting Chrome.

Easy Tab Management: Add new tabs with a '+' button and remove tabs with a '-' button.

Export Function: Export the current tab's content to a text file.

More at https://github.com/VinceStaL/Simple-Note-Chrome-Extension
